member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepositoryAsync`1
member.summary: Generic repository interface with basic asynchronous operations.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepositoryAsync`1.FindAsync(System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous find operation. The task result contains the entity found, or null.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepositoryAsync`1.FindAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous find operation. The task result contains the entity found, or null.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepositoryAsync`1.DeleteAsync(System.Object[])
member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation. The task result will be false if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully removed.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepositoryAsync`1.DeleteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Object[])
member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation. The task result will be false if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully removed.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepository`1
member.summary: Generic repository interface with basic operations.

member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepository`1.Insert(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a new entity into the repository.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IRepository`1.Update(`0)
member.summary: Updates an existing entity in the repository.

member.summary: Removes an entity from the respository.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: False if the entity does not exist in the repository, or true if successfully deleted.

member.name: T:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IUnitOfWorkAsync
member.summary: Unit of work for committing changes across one or more repositories asynchronously.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IUnitOfWorkAsync.SaveChangesAsync
member.summary: Saves changes made to one or more repositories.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains the number of objects saved.

member.name: M:TrackableEntities.Patterns.IUnitOfWorkAsync.SaveChangesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Saves changes made to one or more repositories.
member.param: A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous save operation. The task result contains the number of objects saved.

member.summary: Unit of work for committing changes across one or more repositories.
